nca.name: NCA ECC-2024
nca.desc: Essential Cybersecurity Controls for the Kingdom's Critical National Infrastructure. 114 controls across 5 domains: Governance, Defense, Resilience, Third-Party & Cloud, and ICS.
nca.for: Government entities and private companies in vital services (Electricity, Water, Healthcare, Telecom, Oil & Gas).

sama.name: SAMA CSF
sama.desc: Saudi Central Bank's Cyber Security Framework. Maturity model 0–5: Level 3 is the minimum passing grade; Level 5 is the gold standard where security predicts attacks.
sama.for: Banks, insurance companies, fintechs, and financing companies.

phases.title: Phase 1: Identity audit (NCA)
phases.rule: NCA requires 100% Saudi nationals in cybersecurity roles (ECC-2024).
phases.chaos: Excel chaos: HR and IT spreadsheets, PDFs flying around—proof for the new Cloud Security Lead goes missing.
phases.solution: ArabAudit: Saudization tracker; HR uploads IDs; AI validates all 12 roles → instant green checkmark.

phases.title: Phase 2: Password audit (SAMA)
phases.rule: SAMA requires Maturity Level 3: 90-day password expiry and MFA.
phases.chaos: Screenshot pasted in Word, saved as Evidence_vFinal_REALLY_FINAL.docx in a shared folder.
phases.solution: ArabAudit: Upload screenshot; AI detects 180-day expiry vs 90 required → alert to fix before the examiner arrives.

phases.title: Phase 3: The auditor's visit
phases.rule: SAMA and NCA officials arrive for the final check.
phases.chaos: CEO sweating; IT with USB drives; auditors frustrated by messy technical English.
phases.solution: ArabAudit: Bilingual dashboard on a tablet; switch to Arabic; clear chart of compliance and full history of who fixed what and when.
